key.name: toggle-tiling
key.description: Activate or deactivate tiled window management. When enabled, all windows on the current monitor snap instantly to a Master-Stack layout. When disabled, windows restore to their exact previous floating positions and sizes.

key.name: master-ratio
key.description: The proportion of screen width allocated to the master window. A value of 0.5 splits the screen evenly; higher values give more space to the master window, while lower values favor the stack area.

key.name: window-gap
key.description: The spacing in pixels between adjacent tiled windows and screen edges. Set to 0 for a seamless, gap-free layout.

key.name: focus-left
key.description: Move keyboard focus to the window on the left. If the current window is the leftmost, focus wraps to the master window.

key.name: focus-right
key.description: Move keyboard focus to the window on the right. Useful for quickly navigating from master to stack area.

key.name: focus-up
key.description: Move keyboard focus to the window above. Within the stack area, this cycles through vertically stacked windows.

key.name: focus-down
key.description: Move keyboard focus to the window below. Follows vim-style navigation conventions (j = down).

key.name: swap-left
key.description: Exchange the focused window with the one to its left. Swapping with the master window promotes the current window to master position.

key.name: swap-right
key.description: Exchange the focused window with the one to its right. Useful for demoting the master window to the stack.

key.name: swap-up
key.description: Exchange the focused window with the one above it in the stack.

key.name: swap-down
key.description: Exchange the focused window with the one below it in the stack.

key.name: increase-master-ratio
key.description: Expand the master area by 5%, giving the master window more screen space. The change is applied immediately and persists across sessions.

key.name: decrease-master-ratio
key.description: Shrink the master area by 5%, allocating more space to the stack windows. The change is applied immediately and persists across sessions.
